titles: To the right honourable the Lord Maior, aldermen, and citizens, in Common-Councel assembled. The humble petition of the youngmen and apprentices of the city of London and the liberties thereof.
notes: Annotations on Thomason copy: "presented to ye Common Counsell meeting at Night July In 12 1648"; "for which they had the thanks of the court".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
London (England) --  History --  17th century --  Early works to 1800.
